headlines.description: — Clayton Tune and the Houston Cougars punctuated an impressive season with a win in Southeastern Conference country.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 21 Houston edges Auburn 17-13 in Birmingham Bowl

video.headline: Houston's late score helps seal win in the TicketSmarter Birmingham Bowl

events.name: Air Force Falcons at Louisville Cardinals

headlines.description: — Air Force changed its strategy Tuesday for the First Responder Bowl, taking inspiration from its name and trying out its passing game. It worked.
headlines.shortLinkText: Air Force uses rare passing game to win First Responder Bowl

video.headline: Air Force doubles lead on 61-yard TD pass

events.name: Mississippi State Bulldogs at Texas Tech Red Raiders

headlines.description: — Donovan Smith threw for 252 yards and a touchdown and ran for another score, and Texas Tech beat Mississippi State 34-7 in the Liberty Bowl on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith leads Texas Tech past Leach's Bulldogs in Liberty Bowl

video.headline: Sparkman extends Texas Tech's lead with TD

events.name: West Virginia Mountaineers at Minnesota Golden Gophers

headlines.description: — While watching “Breaking Bad” for the first time last year, a particular scene caught P.J. Fleck's attention.
headlines.shortLinkText: Minnesota beats West Virginia 18-6 in Guaranteed Rate Bowl

video.headline: 6-9, 380-lb lineman barrels in touchdown for Minnesota
